resources.string: Thank you for sharing your location data with us. \n\nThis information can help you stay safe
The application cannot work if you do not share your location with us. Click the button below to grant location permission
The application cannot work if you do not share your location with us. Please go to phone settings and enable location access for the Geofencing app
Some error occurred. Please close the app and try again in some time
Username or password incorrect.\nPlease try again
